mapper.select: SELECT r.node_id, s.share_id, n.node_name, r.report_result, r.report_num, r.created_at, r.updated_at FROM ( ${tablePrefix}content_censor_result r INNER JOIN ${tablePrefix}node n ON r.node_id = n.node_id AND r.report_result = #{status} ) INNER JOIN ${tablePrefix}node_share_setting s ON r.node_id = s.node_id ORDER BY r.updated_at DESC
